thread.title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
thread.title_full: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy

title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
text:
Updated: 10:55 p.m. Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 | Posted: 10:54 p.m. Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy Related View Larger FILE - In this July 18, 2011 file photo, model Chrissy Teigen, left, and singer John Legend pose for photos after the Dineila Brazil swim suit show during the Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week in Miami Beach, Fla. Teigen and Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (AP Photo/J Pat Carter, File) Sponsored Links 
>> RELATED: 'We're pregnant': Chrissy Teigen, John Legend expecting first child 
The 36-year-old musician and 29-year-old model announced the pregnancy Monday on Instagram. A spokeswoman for Teigen confirmed the social media post. 
Legend and Teigen revealed the news by posting a black-and-white photo of themselves with the caption: "We're pregnant!" Teigen wrote that conceiving a child hasn't been easy for the pair and that they are looking forward to growing their family. 
The "All of Me" singer-songwriter and "FABlife" co-host have been married since 2013. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WSOC-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
